name: Reclaiming Authentic Spiritual Power
description: Methods to reconnect with true spiritual sovereignty beyond controlled spiritual systems.

cards.title: Restoring Inner Spiritual Authority
cards.description: Breaking free from external dependency and reclaiming self-mastery.
bulletpoints: Shifting from belief to direct experience.
Understanding personal energetic resonance and intuition.
Breaking the savior complex and external authority fixation.

cards.title: Energetic and Psychic Sovereignty
cards.description: Rebuilding energetic strength and defending against external manipulation.
bulletpoints: Developing mental and psychic shielding techniques.
Strengthening auric fields to resist subtle energetic coercion.
Practices for enhancing self-reliant spiritual awareness.

cards.title: Detoxing from False Spiritual Constructs
cards.description: Purging subconscious programming from infiltrated belief systems.
bulletpoints: Recognizing and releasing subconscious limiting beliefs.
Rebuilding spiritual pathways through direct, unmediated experience.
Integrating higher wisdom without external dependencies.
